name: I’ll Break Panes Up, With Him!
name_original: I’ll Break Panes Up, With Him!
description:
It's time for America's favorite game show: Pane Is Money!
The only thing standing between you and §200,000 is five rounds of panes—sugar glass panes.
Join our protagonist, The Contestant, as he breaks the panes up, with him: The Host.
Will you go home a sweet dry winner or a bitter wet loser?
Test your skills in this thrilling Furry Puzzle Visual Novel!

WARNINGS:

  1. This VN is SFW.  There are a few crude adult jokes but nothing intimate.
  2. This VN is a Spin-Off to I'll Breakup With Him, It'll Pain (IBWHIP)
    1. IBWHIP is an NSFW VN.  You NEED to be 18 years or older to play.
    2. IBWHIP is also currently on hiatus.  It's hard to summarize my hiatus so good luck reading my DevLogs.
  3. This VN is One-Off.  Meaning that besides the point below, I am not going to be adding any content to this, unless this spin-off is much more successful that I could possibly imagine.
    1. You do not need to play IBWHIP to understand IBPUWH.
  1. This is not a submission to NanoReno 2023.   Assets were made before March so therefore, as far as I know, that disqualifies me.
  2. The current version is 0.1.1.  I was not able to animate a certain part of the minigame within the amount of time I gave myself. 
    1. I'll probably need an entire week to figure out the programming of it.  When that is settled, I will update it to 1.X.Y
    2. For sake of getting this VN out on time, the finale is not randomized.  I will put out an minor update when I randomize the finale.

WRITING:
Unagi tries something different in this 5,000 word spin-off.  There are numerous dialogue splits in this attempt at a 3'rd Person Limited Perspective VN.
MINIGAME:
In each of the five rounds, you'll need to position The Host in the correct spot to receive points.  Each round has one of four random panes that you'll need to break with him.
ART:
I think the art looks pretty insert Jojo reference here.
MUSIC:
I didn't have enough to compose any music myself but I did find/license some neat tracks.
